review: Having only used gaming machine and Smart TV apps to access additional content in the past, I was hopeful that this could even come close to its claims.Wow, what a surprise! The interface is smooth and responsive, with no lag. The UI is well organized with plenty of options. There are a multitude of apps available in the Amazon App Store that can be used on this device. And, this is the absolute best way to access all the content available on Amazon Prime!I cannot compare it to Roku, but when compared to PS3 or Samsung & Sony Smart TV apps, Amazon Fire is light-years ahead.
author: Stevie Jay
